gpt_critique.critique: Disagreements on SDG7, SDG12, SDG9, and SDG15: B overstates some topics; Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure seems under-assessed; Life on Land is well-supported.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: Energy topic present but depth limited to one session; not full coverage.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: EIA, urban planning, and development permits are covered; B underestimates.

Life on Land.reason: Explicit land-use focus with forest conservation; supports higher score.
